about_the_game:
Welcome to Number Way!

Number Way is a vibrant and engaging puzzle adventure where every move counts. Navigate a colorful board filled with numbered cells and discover the thrill of connecting them to arrive to the final cell. With simple controls and clever challenges, this game is perfect for casual gamers and puzzle lovers alike.

How it works

In each level, you'll draw a path by connecting adjacent cells—only horizontal and vertical moves are allowed. Your goal is to add up the numbers along your path to match the target value of the pink cell. To complete the level, your path must also end on a cell adjacent to the pink one.

Features

  • Intuitive Puzzle Mechanics: Connect cells to add up to a target number in a dynamic and colorful board.

  • 130 Unique Levels: Enjoy a wide variety of puzzles that steadily increase in challenge.

  • Special Cells: Discover unique cells that offer bonus effects to help you solve even the toughest puzzles.

  • Challenging Boss Battles: Face off against quirky bosses in special levels that test your skills and precision.

  • Casual yet Challenging: Easy to pick up with simple controls, but with enough depth to keep you coming back for more.

Whether you’re planning your moves with care or diving in for quick, fun sessions, Number Way offers a refreshing twist on puzzle games. Sharpen your strategy, trust your instincts, and see if you have what it takes to conquer the board!

Trace your path to victory in Number Way – where every move can make all the difference!

name: Number Way

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual-Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU or above
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 compatible GPU or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any standard sound card
  • Additional Notes: The game is lightweight and should run smoothly on most modern computers.

short_description: Number Way is a fun math puzzle adventure. Navigate the board to arrive to the final cell by connecting paths—no backtracking or diagonal moves allowed! With over 130 exciting levels, special cells, and quirky boss battles, it's a fresh challenge for casual gamers ready to test their skills.
